titles.title: A bill to change the cutoff date determining which Farmers Home Administration borrowers may request that the interest rates they pay be the lower of the interest rate in effect on the date of loan approval or the date of loan closure.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Conservation Credit and Rural Development.

bill.summary: 6/30/1987--Introduced. Amends the Supplemental Appropriations Act, 1985 to change the effective date from November 12, 1983, to October 1, 1981, for Farmers Home Administration loan rate purposes.
